rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill School of Medicine
comments: She knows so much about the ancient Greek language and can answer any question. She moves very quickly and the class takes a lot of study time, but when you actually translate something it's worth it.
A really good professor. She is tough, but getting through the class at the end feels like you have done something big.
One of the nicest people I've ever met! The material is really hard but she is so knowledgeable about it and can answer the most obscure questions.
